Html:
One of the standards we have at our company is to include a couple extra columns on each table. They are set by defaults. On the current tables, I have written a script to set them up ahead of time. However, there are a couple Insert statements that do not include the fields for the Container and Revision tables. For example, SaveRevision, SaveLoop, SaveInterchange, etc. As a result, the Insert statement fails. Is there any way the fields will be added to these? If not, I can work around it another way.

Thanks again for all the work you are doing!!
